sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"虫，昆虫"之意。
means: bug ： 指小昆虫，尤指吸血的臭虫，也可指细菌。
insect ： 含义广泛，多指蚂蚁、黄蜂、蝉等等。
pest ： 指有害的昆虫或有害的小动物。
worm ： 侧重指蚯蚓、蚕、毛虫等小而无骨的虫。

sentence.Network_en: Honeybees use one of the most sophisticated communication systems of any insect.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜜蜂之间所用的交流方式是昆虫中最为复杂的方式之一。

sentence.Network_en: Many kinds of insect find their mates by scent.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多昆虫通过气味找到交配对象。

sentence.Network_en: Chambers' voice droned, maddening as an insect around his head.
sentence.Network_cn: 钱伯斯一直在他耳边嗡嗡地说个不停，他都快疯了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (originally denoting any small cold-blooded creature with a segmented body): from Latin (animal) insectum 'segmented (animal') (translating Greek zōion entomon), from insecare 'cut up or into', from in- 'into' + secare 'to cut'

entry.def: An insect is a small animal that has six legs. Most insects have wings. Ants, flies, butterflies, and beetles are all insects.

means.word_mean: 2. a person who has a nasty or unethical character undeserving of respect

stems_affixes.word_buile: sect切,割+arian……的,有人的意思→把人群分开的→搞宗派的
section[[n.章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面]]糠?al……的→adj.可组合的
dissect[v.解剖;详细研究]+ion表名词→n.解剖,切开
in进入+sect切,割→昆虫一节一节如被切开

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相交,交叉;道路交叉口,十字路口
stems_affixes.word_buile: intersect[v.横断]+ion表名词→n.相交,交叉;道路交叉口,十字路口

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面

inter在……中间+sect切割 →在中间切→横断

Sentence.sentence: They are thought to be the only insect that does this.
Scientists learn about the monarch butterflies' migration by capturing and placing the identifying tags in the insects.

sentences.en: He was bitten by an insect in the garden.
sentences.cn: 他在花园里被虫子咬了一口。

jushi.english: There are many kinds of insects in this area.
jushi.chinese: 这个地区有许多种昆虫。

jushi.english: He was bitten by an insect in the garden.
